name: VideoGameUpdate-NewsfromHandsomePhantom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Need a quick and concise way to find all your video gaming news in one place? Here it is! 

Brought to you by HandsomePhantom.com, this Flash Briefing will fill you in on any video game news you may have missed.

If you like what you hear and want us to keep doing it, check out Patreon.com/HandsomePhantom

And don't forget to visit HandsomePhantom.com for all our video game related content!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
